ScanTemplate.templateDescription: Conducts CIS benchmark compliance testing and security auditing across both the operating system and application layers on supported platforms. This scan requires administrative authentication. Vulnerability checks are not included and only default ports are scanned.

Plugin.name: java/HttpScanner
Plugin.param: Virata-EmWeb, Allegro-Software-RomPager, JetDirect, HP JetDirect, HP Web Jetadmin, HP-ChaiSOE, HP-ChaiServer, CUPS, DigitalV6-HTTPD, Rapid Logic, Agranat-EmWeb, cisco-IOS, RAC_ONE_HTTP, RMC Webserver, EWS-NIC3, EMWHTTPD, IOS, ESWeb
